name: real_of_rat_lt
statement: ∀r1 r2. real_of_rat r1 < real_of_rat r2 ⇔ r1 < r2

name: real_of_rat_add
statement: ∀r1 r2. real_of_rat (r1 + r2) = real_of_rat r1 + real_of_rat r2

name: real_of_rat_mul
statement: ∀r1 r2. real_of_rat (r1 * r2) = real_of_rat r1 * real_of_rat r2

name: real_of_rat_sub
statement: ∀r1 r2. real_of_rat (r1 - r2) = real_of_rat r1 - real_of_rat r2

name: real_of_rat_div
statement: x ≠ 0 ⇒ real_of_rat (x' / x) = real_of_rat x' / real_of_rat x

name: rat_of_int_eq
statement:
gcd (Num (ABS n1)) d1 = 1 ∧ d1 ≠ 0 ∧
  gcd (Num (ABS n2)) d2 = 1 ∧ d2 ≠ 0 ∧
  rat_of_int n1 / &d1 = rat_of_int n2 / &d2 ⇒
  n1 = n2 ∧ d1 = d2

name: real_of_int_div_eq
statement:
∀n d n' d'.
    gcd (Num (ABS n')) d' = 1 ∧ d' ≠ 0 ∧
    gcd (Num (ABS n)) d = 1 ∧ d ≠ 0 ⇒
    (real_of_int n / &d = real_of_int n' / &d' ⇔ n = n' ∧ d = d')

name: real_of_rat_def
statement:
real_of_rat (r:rat) : real =
    intreal$real_of_int (RATN r) /  real_of_num (RATD r)

name: toString_def
statement:
toString (RatPair i n) =
    if n = 1 then mlint$toString i else
      concat [mlint$toString i ; implode"/" ; mlint$toString (&n)]
